sentences.en: A cold is an infection of the upper respiratory tract.
sentences.cn: 感冒是上呼吸道的感染。

sentences.en: Children jumped from upper floors as the building fell down around them.
sentences.cn: 大楼倒塌时，孩子们从上面几层楼上跳了下来。

sentences.en: Give your upper body a workout by using handweights.
He curled his upper lip in a show of scepticism.
His upper lip was flat, but the lower one sagged.
I then went up to Lancaster University and got an upper second.
sentences.cn: 后来，我考上了兰开斯特大学，获得了二级甲等学位。

sentences.en: It was easy to see who had the upper hand.
Many students were trapped by smoke and fire on an upper floor.
sentences.cn: 许多学生被浓烟和大火困在了较高的一层上。

sentences.en: Students travel the cheap lower deck and tourists the upper.
sentences.cn: 学生坐廉价的下层舱，游客坐上层舱。

sentences.en: The beginnings of a moustache showed on his upper lip.
sentences.cn: 他的上唇部位开始长胡子了。

sentences.en: The man's heavy moustache hid his upper lip completely.
sentences.cn: 那个男人浓密的髭须完全遮住了他的上唇。

sentences.en: the upper echelons(= the most important members ) of corporate management
sentences.cn: 公司管理人员中的高层

sentences.en: The upper layer of felt should overlap the lower.
sentences.cn: 毛毡的上层应与下层重叠。

sentences.en: the upper slopes of the mountain
They have purged thousands from the upper levels of the civil service.
sentences.cn: 他们从上层文职部门清除了上千名公务员。

sentences.en: We also recommend a full day optional excursion to the Upper Douro.
sentences.cn: 我们还推荐去杜罗河上游的短途自选一日游。

words.tran_cn: 至上的；最高的；最主要的
最高地；最重要地；最突出地

trans.tran_en: in a higher position than something else
